Class AppTest

java.lang.Object
ISO2.Exe2.AppTest
public class AppTest extends Object
Test suite for App class (main application). Tests cover: - Valid input scenarios for each fare type - No match scenarios - Input validation errors (negative values) - Invalid enum values Uses System.in/out redirection to simulate user input and capture output.
